catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Taught by Mariano Siskind and members of the Department. For honors seniors writing a thesis. Successful completion of two terms of Latin American Studies 99 is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators. Students who not complete a thesis are required to submit a substantial paper in order to receive credit for each part of the series.
catalog_info.prereq: Prerequisite: French 98 OR Italian 98 OR Portuguese 98 OR Spanish 98 OR Romance Studies 98 OR Latin American Studies 98
catalog_info.description: Weekly individual instruction for honors seniors writing a thesis. Part two of a two part series.
